events.message: Customer reported a minor car accident involving rear-end collision in downtown. Filed claim promptly after the incident.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to incident details matching car collision parameters.
An experienced claims agent was promptly assigned to the case to ensure smooth handling and customer support.
Claim acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt and outlining next steps for documentation and investigation.
Request for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license was sent to customer to support claim validation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos, facilitating prompt review of the incident.
Investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and vehicle damage reports to assess responsibility.
Investigation concluded, confirming the insured vehicle was hit from behind, with clear fault determined on the other party.
Based on investigation findings, a fair settlement covering repair costs and rental vehicle expenses was proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with proposed settlement and timely communication throughout the claim process.
Approvals for the settlement were finalized internally, authorizing payment to proceed without further delays.
Settlement payment was successfully transferred to customer’s designated bank account, confirming claim resolution.
The claim was officially closed after confirmed receipt of payment and final feedback from the customer.
All claim records, documents, and correspondence were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
